# CodingDrone


* Install
```
> pip install CodingDrone
> pip --no-cache-dir install CodingDrone
```

* Upgrade
```
> pip install --upgrade CodingDrone
```

* Uninstall
```
> pip uninstall CodingDrone
```



## Link

* [PyPI CodingDrone](https://pypi.org/project/CodingDrone/)
* [ALUX Dev](http://dev.byrobot.co.kr/)


### ALUX
